bioAsHtml: Amy is a Technical Evangelist at Microsoft UK specialising in Data Science and Machine Learning. She is passionate about data and always keen to share experiences and expertise with like-minded individuals and organisations. She blogs, presents and you’ll find her online at TechNet and Techdays Online, as well as in person at events like the Data Culture series.

acceptedTalks.title: Predicting the Future with Machine Learning

bio: Amy is a Technical Evangelist at Microsoft UK specialising in Data Science and Machine Learning. She is passionate about data and always keen to share experiences and expertise with like-minded individuals and organisations. She blogs, presents and you’ll find her online at TechNet and Techdays Online, as well as in person at events like the Data Culture series.
